title: Dr. Jimmy Zhenning Xu
text:
YouTube
  
  
    
     Twitter
  
  
    
     LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Github
  

  
  
Hello, I am Jimmy Xu.
Hi, I am “Jimmy” Zhenning Xu. I am a data analyst and a marketing consultant specialized in analytics, dashboard design, and AI applications. Explore my blog to learn more about marketing data analytics, using R for business analytics, R & Python programming, Tableau dashboard design, and a bit of everything in between.
As of 2024, I have authored over 20 peer-reviewed papers, which have been published in prestigious journals such as the Journal of Business Research, the Journal of Marketing Analytics, the Journal of Marketing Theory and Practice, the Journal of Macromarketing, Qualitative Market Research, an International Journal, Emerging Markets Finance, and Trade, the American Marketing Association (AMS) conference proceedings, the INFORMS conference proceedings, the DSI conference proceedings, the IEEE conference proceedings, and the ACM conference proceedings. Furthermore, he has actively contributed to various international conferences by serving on program committees.
In this template you can find examples of using listing (grid, table, default) in Projects, Talks, Blog. Read more about lists here.

title: calendR package: create fully customizable ready-to-print monthly and yearly calendars in R
text: This is the first post in my Quarto blog. Welcome!

title: calendR package: create fully customizable ready-to-print monthly and yearly calendars in R
text:
A simple application

library(calendR)

~~ Package calendR
Visit https://r-coder.com/ for R tutorials ~~

calendR() # Defaults to the current year




The package allows creating fully customized monthly and yearly calendars (you can also specify custom start and end dates).
